description: An electrician who once attended Tomoya`s high school and lived as a rock musician. He is admired by Mei for his infrequent rock play. Tomoya first met Yuusuke during a street light accident involving a person`s car, but was actually a cat that cause the dent on the car. Tomoya assists Yuusuke in his work, and after working Tomoya is tired, realizes the pain of working in society. He is engaged to Kouko, and is also one of the reason why Fuuko exists in the school.
name: Yoshino Yuusuke
